manpage.title: _strupr, _wcsupr

description.para: Convert lower case letters to upper case letters in the string.

return.para: Each function returns pointer to converted string. Since conversion is at the same location, function returned pointer is as same as parameter string pointer. NULL represents wrong return value.

remarks.para: Function _strupr converts all lower case letters in the string to upper case letters without affecting other characters. _wcsupr is the wide character version of _strupr and the parameter of _wcsupr is wide character string. Besides, it is as same as function _strupr.

manpage.result: Mixed: The String to End All Strings! Lower: the string to end all strings!
